title: A direction for the weaker sort of Christians shewing in what manner they ought to fit and prepare themselues to the worthy receiuing of the Sacrament of the body and blood of Christ: with a short forme of triall or examination annexed. Grounded vpon 1. Cor.11.23.-30. By W.B. Whereunto is adioined a verie profitable treatise of the same argument, by way of question and answer, written by another.
author: Bradshaw, William, 1571-1618.
publisher: Printed by W. Hall for Samuel Macham, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Bul-head,
notes: In two parts; part 2 has separate dated title page reading: "The doctrine of communicating worthily in the Lords Supper". Pagination and register are separate.
Part 2 is anonymous. By Arthur Hildersam.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
